N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 620.2 - Allocation of expenditures for public assistance and care

State Regulations

Expenditures directly chargeable to particular public
assistance and care programs or activities shall be claimed on formats
prescribed by the department, except that costs required to be allocated or
distributed by regulation or direction of the department shall be claimed as
required for those costs or items. Except as otherwise required by departmental
regulation or directive, costs that must be allocated or distributed to
particular programs or activities include: (a) eligibility determination
costs; (b) training
costs; (c) management systems
establishment and maintenance costs; (d) other administrative salary and related
personnel expenditures; (e) contractual personnel expenditures; (f) other nonsalary administrative costs; and
(g) other costs not directly
chargeable to particular programs or activities. Notes
